item.title: This Trump trade returned 29% in six months — but its authors say it’s time for a big change.
item.description: Miners and rare earth plays boosted gains for a strategy devised by Ned Davis Research

item.title: Verizon sees its best subscriber growth in six years as new CEO sends a message to rivals
item.description: CEO Dan Schulman, who took over in October, says Verizon will no longer be a “hunting ground” for its competitors.

item.title: ‘I’m worried about cash flow’: I’m 71 with a $2.7 million IRA and $470K in stocks. Why can’t I relax?
item.description: “My home is paid for and has an estimated value of $700,000.”

item.title: Gold’s searing run halted, silver drops below $100 as expectations of Warsh to Fed hits dollar debasement trade
item.description: A selloff is underway for gold, silver and copper on Friday, as the dollar rises on expectations that Kevin Warsh will be the next Federal Reserve cha...

item.title: My ‘distrustful and selfish’ brother is executor of our family estate. How can I clip his wings?
item.description: “I am the third trustee appointed to my late parents’ trust.”
